home.app-function: Single entry point for ordering voice services in your country
home.sponsor: Built on CIO Hybrid Cloud Powered by Red Hat OpenShift
home.question: What service or country are you looking for?
home.search-text: Click here to see all results in GVS search
home.find-right-service: Find the right services, check their availability,
home.find-right-service2: and then choose the way you connect and work together.
home.jabber-description: Cisco Jabber is a multiple platform soft phone application to make and receive phone calls.

footer.aditional-question: Have additional questions about ordering Global Voice Services ?
footer.consult: * This website supports Mozilla Firefox, Google Chrome, IE, Edge and Safari.

footnote.Please bear in mind the following points: Please bear in mind the following points when making a request :
footnote.To make a request the Employee must exis: To make a request the Employee must exist in BluePages (except for cancellation requests).
footnote.You must know the IBM serial Number of t: You must know the IBM serial Number of the person making the request.
footnote.Only one request per employee per reques: Only one request per employee per request type is processed at a time.

Jabberservices.initiateJabber: Please click on a request type below to initiate a Jabber service request.

Jabbernewtrans.Reqnewservice: This request can be submitted for yourself, or on behalf of another employee. Fields marked with an asterisk
Jabbernewtrans.Name: Name
Jabbernewtrans.norecord: There is no record of an IBM employee with the serial number
Jabbernewtrans.opps: Something seems to have gone wrong. Please try later.
Jabbernewtrans.pleasesubmittostart: By submitting this provisioning request, you are providing express written consent for IBM to process the Personal Information (PI) that you have provided as part of the provisioning process.Press submit to start the process of provisioning your Jabber service.

servicestitle.Special Request: Special Request for an existing service

employeeinfotrans.ifinfoiscorrect: If the following information is correct, click Next. Any errors must be corrected in the employee's
employeeinfotrans.Name: Name:
employeeinfotrans.noteligiblejabber: The serial number that you have entered is not eligible to request Jabber account.
employeeinfotrans.itnexistsforuser: The IBM Telephone Number (ITN) that exists for this user is .
employeeinfotrans.nojabber: There is no Jabber for this serial number.
employeeinfotrans.nojabberusethislink: The serial number you have entered does not own an IP Telephone Number (ITN) and so is not eligible for Jabber. Please use this link to raise a request for an ITN
employeeinfotrans.receiveITN: you have received the ITN you can then request Jabber.  Thank you.
employeeinfotrans.notauthorizedtoaccessjabber: The serial number that you have entered is not authorized to access Jabber service. You can access IP Extension option available on the left side menu. For any further queries about Jabber, please contact

employeeinfotrans.noteligibletorequestmorethanonejabber: The serial number that you have entered is not eligible to request more than one Jabber account.
employeeinfotrans.ITNexistsforthisuser: The IBM Telephone Number (ITN) that exists for this users jabber account is
